ProjectTitle: Role of long non-coding RNA in tumour-associated macrophage polarization
InitialFeedbackHistory: 07/07/2022 4. [REDACTED] and metadata: you can add here how you document your work for your own record, do you use (e)-notebooks, readme files, SOPs, protocols? [REDACTED] sharing you mention GEO and arrayexpress, best also to read their submission guidelines already to collect all the metadata you need to deposit your data: www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/info/submission.html. [REDACTED] can also have a look at the arrive guidelines for reporting of animal experiments already: https://arriveguidelines.org/, journals may ask you to follow these. [REDACTED] data for which there is no disciplinary repository you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
